courses.name: National Insurance Number
courses.description: Understand the importance of obtaining a National Insurance Number for legal employment and social security benefits in the UK.

courses.name: Registering with the NHS and Dentist
courses.description: Learn the process of registering with the National Health Service (NHS) and finding a local dentist for your healthcare needs.

courses.name: Health and Dental Insurance
courses.description: Explore options and benefits of health and dental insurance plans to ensure comprehensive coverage for medical and dental care.

courses.name: Global Health Card: Free International Medical Care
courses.description: Discover the Global Health Card for access to free international medical care and essential information for travel-related health concerns.

courses.name: The Employment Tribunal
courses.description: Gain insights into the Employment Tribunal process, addressing workplace disputes and ensuring fair treatment for employees.

courses.name: Drivers Licence, MOT and Vehicle Taxs
courses.description: Navigate the requirements for obtaining a driver's licence, ensuring vehicle roadworthiness with MOT, and managing vehicle tax obligations.

courses.name: Registering with HMRC and Submitting a Tax Return
courses.description: Learn the steps to register with His Majesty's Revenue and Customs (HMRC) and fulfill tax obligations, including submitting an annual tax return.

courses.name: Unemployment, Benefits and Grants
courses.description: Understand the support available during unemployment, explore benefit options, and discover potential grants to aid financial stability.

courses.name: Pregnancy and Maternity Benefits
courses.description: Access information on pregnancy and maternity benefits, ensuring proper support and understanding available resources during this life stage.

courses.name: Electoral Roll

courses.name: Criminal Record Checks
courses.description: Starting early is very important when it comes to saving for your pension. This will allow you more years to save for your retirement.

courses.name: Pension
courses.description: Plan for the future by understanding the pension system, exploring options, and securing financial well-being in retirement.
